content: Not valid with other discount coupons or plans.
Please click the link in the voucher sent after the purchase to open the website page, press the Use button, and present the screen to the staff.
Please make sure that your smartphone connects to the internet as you will need to launch the website from your smartphone.
Your admission fee covers the bathing fee, yukata and towel rental, and facility usage fee
Please check the official website for information on changes in operating hours and temporary closures.
